attributes.action: Get photos of paedophiles and sex offenders published
attributes.additional_details:
thousands of paedophiles and sex offenders in the world are allowed to freely access our towns, visits shops, and live near schools and parks unsuspected.
To many a name is just a name.... unless theres a FACE...

the new face next door could be a paedophile or a sex offender and you wouldnt know.

its about time ANY convicted paedophile or sex offender gets their FACE printed alongside articles in local newspaper... they can easily be your new neighbour
